color.red_desc: An integer between 0 and 255, representing the red component of the color
color.green_desc: An integer between 0 and 255, representing the green component of the color
color.blue_desc: An integer between 0 and 255, representing the blue component of the color
color.alpha_desc: An integer between 0 and 255, representing the transparency of the color, defined as 0 (completely transparent) ~ 255 (completely opaque)
